Item ID2603

Adamant kiteshield (t) is a part of adamant trimmed armour and a reward from medium Treasure Trails. It has the same stats as a normal Adamant kiteshield, and requires level 30 Defence to wear. This item cannot be made via the Smithing skill.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-8-3
 Defence bonuses
+27+31+29-1+29
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+0List

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The shield's ranged attack bonus has been decreased from -2 to -3.

12 June 2014
(update)

The item was renamed from "Adam kiteshield (t)" to "Adamant kiteshield (t)".

[[File:Adamant kiteshield (t) detail.png|left|150px]]
'''Adamant kiteshield (t)''' is a part of [[adamant trimmed armour]] and a reward from [[Clue scroll (medium)|medium]] [[Treasure Trails]]. It has the same stats as a normal [[Adamant kiteshield]], and requires level 30 [[Defence]] to wear. This item '''cannot''' be made via the [[Smithing]] skill.
